DOC.brief_summary: To see if the use of Abdominal Binders improves patients out comes after cesarean delivery
DOC.brief_title: The Use of Abdominal Binders in Patients Undergoing Cesarean Sections
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion: All patients admitted to labor and delivery Consented patients who had a cesarean delivery will be randomized using a number table to receive or not receive an abdominal binder. Outcomes: On postoperative days 1 and 2, patients were asked to complete a pain visual analog scale and the validated Symptom Distress Scale. Postoperative hemoglobin and hematocrit were also recorded.
DOC.criteria: Women undergoing cesarean section for any indication unable to give consent
